T

TCPClient - Class in com.moglan.eac.model.connection
A TCP client that uses a handshake protocol for exchanging data with a server and ending its connection with it.
TCPClient(String, int) - Constructor for class com.moglan.eac.model.connection.TCPClient
 
TCPClientTask - Class in com.moglan.eac.model.connection
Used for handling exchanges on one connection in a separate thread.
TCPClientTask(TCPServer, Socket) - Constructor for class com.moglan.eac.model.connection.TCPClientTask
 
TCPServer - Class in com.moglan.eac.model.connection
A TCP server capable of handling requests from multiple clients at the same time.
TCPServer(int) - Constructor for class com.moglan.eac.model.connection.TCPServer
 
TCPServerTask - Class in com.moglan.eac.model.connection
Allows launching the server operations on a separate thread so that they can be stopped asynchronously from the main thread.
TCPServerTask(TCPServer) - Constructor for class com.moglan.eac.model.connection.TCPServerTask
 
textArea - Variable in class com.moglan.eac.model.util.TextAreaHandler
 
TextAreaHandler - Class in com.moglan.eac.model.util
